--- On Mon, 2/23/09, secretary <secretarytocapt3@...> wrote:
From: secretary <secretarytocapt3@...>
Subject: [SHQ] Mibugishiden director wins Oscar
To: SHQ@yahoogroups.com
Date: Monday, February 23, 2009, 6:37 AM











    
            Mibugishiden (Mibu gishi den 2003) or "When the Last Sword is Drawn"

director Yojiro Takita won an Oscar at the 81st Academy Awards last

night for his film DEPARTURES which deals with death, the taboo of

death and life and other complex stuff.



I still wish there was an interview, in English, of Jiro Asada

concerning the writing of the novel.
